entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:05 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 02:39 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Rain or light snow mixed with freezing rain ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
